name: Darts Up 3D
description: 83% off if you own Darts Up on Wii U! Your Wii U™ and Nintendo 3DS™ must be linked with the same Nintendo Network ID. The ultimate darts game is now on Nintendo 3DS™. Darts Up 3D is a fun game of darts in which you will have complete control over aiming thanks to the Nintendo 3DS™ motion sensor. You can play with your friends and family, up to a maximum of 4 Players, using the Mii™ to create your profile. Darts Up 3D has several playing modes, including the famous 501. Features of Darts Up 3D: - Send the full Darts Up 3D using the "Download Play" option. - 4 Players on just one Nintendo 3DS™. - Create your own profile using the Mii™. - Use the motion sensor to aim and view the surroundings. - Entirely in 3D Stereoscopic. - Three playing modes, including 501!
